actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the consent of Congress to John E. Dolibois accepting appointment as Honorary Vice Consul of Luxembourg for the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Expresses the consent of Congress to John E. Dolibois accepting appointment as Honorary Vice Consul of Luxembourg for the State of Ohio.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the consent of Congress to John E. Dolibois accepting appointment as Honorary Vice Consul of Luxembourg for the State of Ohio.
